name: Zorpocolypse
description:
Earth is under attack by the Zorps, a very cute but dangerous alien race that has descended upon our planet, hungry for various power sources scattered around the world. Defend your home by placing a variety of traps and barricades around your home to slow down and stop the invasion. The fate of the planet is in your hands!

Zorpocalypse is a Third-Person, Wave-Based, Strategy game using different traps to defend yourself. Slay Zorps in order to generate money to buy traps, and defend the power source at the end of the level.

Controls:

  • Mouse - Move Camera
  • Mouse Button 1- Shoot
  • WASD - Move Player
  • Space - Jump
  • 1234567 - Traps

Credits:

Brandon - Artist: https://www.artstation.com/brandon_jones

Jamie - Artist: https://www.artstation.com/jamie-mcfarlane

Jack - Programmer

Joel - Programmer

How to Install:

  1. Download from the button below
  2. Unzip the file
  3. Run "Zorpocolypse.exe"
  4. Enjoy :D
